parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name>game1</name>=<value> arma3

</value></part><part><name>version1</name>=<value> 1.68

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value> Sets the path to follow for AI driver. Note that [[unitReady]] will return [[true]] even if AI is still driving through the points.<br>
Using any other ''move'' command (e.g <template><title>ic</title><part><name index="1"/><value>vehicleName [[move]] [[getPos]] vehicleName</value></part></template>) or [[doStop]] will stop the effect of this command.

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> vehicleName [[setDriveOnPath]] points

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> vehicleName: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> points: [[Array]] - list of [[Position|Positions]] to format [x,y,z] OR to format [x,y,z, speed], speed being '''in m/s'''.

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>myVehicle [[setDriveOnPath]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[getMarkerPos]] "wp1", [[getMarkerPos]] "wp2"];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_points = [[allMapMarkers]] [[apply]] { [[getMarkerPos]] _x; }; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>getting all marker positions</value></part></template>
{ [[Magic Variables#x|_x]] [[pushBack]] 15; } forEach _points; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>setting [[speed]]</value></part></template>
myVehicle [[setDriveOnPath]] _points;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[move]], [[forceSpeed]], [[limitSpeed]], [[Waypoint]]
</value></part></template></root>
